title: Teams is great, would love external camera support on iPad
text: Teams is great. Most of the features i rely on teams for on my laptop are available on iPad. I frequently use my iPad and Teams for video calls on the go. Because the iPad Pro FaceTime camera is on the left side of the iPad when using the Magic Keyboard, I‚Äôd love to use something like the Opal Tadpole as an external webcam. Would be great if support for external webcams could be added to expand usability.

title: Life Saver
text: I love the call answering capability, chatting with anyone at anytime, I can send voicemails to people, and I use it to send files from one device to another! Teams is a LIFE SAVER!

title: Change notification sounds
text: Please for the love of dogs let me change notification sounds. Slack had several options for sounds. My dog has developed a fear of the ding, it started with Facebook messenger bleeps- she would literally shake at their sound. You would think she came from a house of abuse, but no- she‚Äôs just neurotic. Apparently teams notifications sounds close enough to FB messenger. It‚Äôs such a simple change, let us select different sounds so we aren‚Äôt assaulted with such an aggressive DING!

text: Most of the app functions work as expected. Use for work. One of the key functions does not work for me - Notifications. I see badges on the app icon but I do not receive any banner notifications or alerts when a message or phone call comes in.

title: Overall it works, could be better
text: I use this all the time for screen sharing. I use my phone significantly more than my laptop in meetings. It is frustrating that after this time Teams does not use my full screen even when ‚Äúfocusing on content‚Äù. The space by the island is wasted and significant space is wasted on the end of the screen as well. At the very least when I start zooming in these spaces should show the content. Please fix this.

title: App is okay but always shows one notification
text: No matter what it always shows one badge notification, even after signing out and back in. After whatever update was last week on the IOS it has done this. Prior to that I would‚Äôve given 5 stars but I‚Äôm someone who has to check all of my notifications! This is a very annoying bug! I wish they would fix it.

title: Teams App
text: This app is a live saver it connects you to everything in a single location. I love the ease of access to flow between multiple different sites an apps.

title: Essential But Clunky
text: Teams meetings have become more effective for presenting than in-person meetings, but navigation remains clunky. Opening multiple windows is not intuitive, and referencing multiple team SharePoint (or are they OneDrive) file locations takes too many clicks. There must be training, but this kind of navigation should be more intuitive.
